entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow or rain. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
